2024.context: C3.ai, Inc. is a enterprise AI software company focused on AI applications for enterprise, government, and defense. Generative AI pivot with C3 Generative AI. Partnership with Google Cloud.

competitors.notes: Heavyweight in enterprise analytics and AI, significantly larger than C3.ai, Gotham for government, Foundry and AIP for commercial
